elements.title: Wibaut­straat metro station
elements.contents: ... that the letters on the platform walls of Wibaut­straat metro station (pictured) refer to the offices of Dutch newspapers that were located on the street above?

elements.title: Four Epigraphs after Escher
elements.contents: ... that Four Epigraphs after Escher is a 1993 piano trio by Graham Waterhouse for viola, heckelphone and piano based on four graphic artworks by M. C. Escher including Reptiles?

elements.title: The Babadook
elements.contents: ... that after 2014 horror film The Babadook was listed as an "LGBT film" by Netflix, the titular monster was adopted as a gay icon in internet memes?

elements.title: Dērītum
elements.contents: ... that the statue of the goddess Dērītum had to be ceremonially bathed?

elements.title: Ken Kortas
elements.contents: ... that Ken Kortas lost money speculating on hog futures during his NFL career?

elements.title: terbium compounds
elements.contents: ... that terbium compounds have applications in fields such as optics because of their green fluorescence?

elements.title: Brendan Bechtel
elements.contents: ... that one of Chairman and CEO Brendan Bechtel's first jobs was to install security cables for laptops at Bechtel headquarters in San Francisco when he was 14 years old?

elements.title: Essential Formulas Worth a Thousand in Gold for Emergencies
elements.contents: ... that the Chinese medical text Essential Formulas Worth a Thousand in Gold for Emergencies warns its readers not to share its formulas "even for a thousand in gold"?
